short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to open all links on the currently open Hacker News page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seal-iously is a Chrome extension designed to simplify your Hacker News reading experience. Tired of opening and navigating through links one by one? With Seal-iously, you can open multiple links on Hacker News simultaneously, saving you time and making your browsing more efficient. Say goodbye to the hassle and hello to a smarter way to read Hacker News. Install Seal-iously from the Chrome Web Store today and experience Hacker News like never before!
